## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5bdfc79774e38e50aab46dada0d253eed83fd0d0cb05c9e570b93f8182e1d5e0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'legacy_esg_odf_common' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
